column1: Senate Vote #11 1789-09-02T00:00:00 - TO AMEND THE HOUSE RESOLUTION TO PROPOSE CERTAIN ARTICLES TO THE LEGISLATURES OF THE STATES AS AMENDMENTS TO THE CONSTITUTION; SO AS TO AMEND THE FIRST CLAUSE TO STATE "AFTER THE FIRST ENUMERATION REQUIRED BY THE FIRST ARTICLE OF THE CONSTITUTION
column2: THERE SHALL BE ONE REPRESENTATIVE FOR EVERY 30
column3: 000 UNTIL THE NUMBER SHALL AMOUNT TO TWO HUNDRED."
